channel.title: CVE Feed for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE 4 series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EC-CUBE CO.,LTD. -- EC-CUBE 4 series

item.title: CVE-2023-25077|2023-03-05T00:00:00 -- ec-cube%20co.%2Cltd. -- ec-cube%204%20series
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Authentication Key Settings of EC-CUBE 4.0.0 to 4.0.6-p2, EC-CUBE 4.1.0 to 4.1.2-p1, and EC-CUBE 4.2.0 allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.
